milestones.title: Model Design & Simulation
milestones.description: Develop a detailed economic framework incorporating revenue streams (housing, services, retail, energy), cost structures, and reinvestment loops. Run simulations for sustainability, scalability, and resilience under different growth and risk scenarios.
